title: doc: debugging_with-gdb.html: obsolete link to dwarf linker source
body:
The debugging with gdb documentation provided with Go 1.5 links to "/src/cmd/ld/dwarf.c", a file that was (re?)moved and as part of Go 1.5's rewrite:

https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/doc/debugging_with_gdb.html#L127

I believe the correct value is now "/src/cmd/link/internal/ld/dwarf.go".
